amendment.description: To improve the authorities relating to policies and practices on test and evaluation to address emerging acquisition approaches.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4198 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4198 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5933) To improve the authorities relating to policies and practices on test and evaluation to address emerging acquisition approaches.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4198 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4198 proposed by Senator Warner.
